author: Simon Difford
description: Tangy, fruity and packed with flavour. Clove spice, fragrant floral pisco and elderflower with a hint of sweet pineapple and sour grapefruit.
name: Pyramid Punch

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
(If pimento dram is not available then (in place of) MUDDLE two cloves in the base of the shaker before adding other ingredients and shaking with ice)
